experiences.title: Junior Software Engineer
description: CloudSync Design & Implementation: Architected and developed a Python-based synchronization solution—CloudSync—that automates account and permission management from Exchange Online into Zivver using the SCIM protocol. By integrating with Azure Automate, CloudSync requires no manual version management or dedicated servers.

Scalable & Secure User Management: Enabled a secure, scalable, and cost-effective approach to user identity synchronization for Zivver clients up to 10,000 users, ensuring smooth onboarding, maintenance, and compliance through fully automated processes.

Team Collaboration & Mentorship: Onboarded and guided 3 interns, working closely with senior engineers to promote cross-skill development into frontend, knowledge sharing, and a culture of continuous learning within the team.
